item.title: Heroku overview
item.author: Author
item.description: Heroku can help us deploy our application(back end) rapidly and easy deploy The only we need to take care is the PORT of your app. You have to use the PORT in environment. In Node.js 1 PORT = process.env.PORT || 3000; // 3000 can be anything else heroku cli Home page heroku login heroku create git push heroku master
